name: Bulbasaur
pokedex: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the suns rays the seed grows progressively larger.

name: Ivysaur
pokedex: There is a bud on this Pokemons back. To support its weight Ivysaurs legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight its a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.

name: Venusaur
pokedex: There is a large flower on Venusaurs back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flowers aroma soothes the emotions of people.

name: Charmander
pokedex: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is enjoying itself. If the Pokemon becomes enraged the flame burns fiercely.

name: Charmeleon
pokedex: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe it turns aggressive. In this excited state the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.

name: Charizard
pokedex: Charizard flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.

name: Squirtle
pokedex: Squirtles shell is not merely used for protection. The shells rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water enabling this Pokemon to swim at high speeds.

name: Wartortle
pokedex: Its tail is large and covered with a rich thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokemons toughness as a battler.

name: Blastoise
pokedex: Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

name: Caterpie
pokedex: Its easy to catch and it grows quickly making it one of the top recommendations for novice Pokemon Trainers.

name: Metapod
pokedex: Its shell is hard but its still just a bug shell. Its been known to break so intense battles with it should be avoided.

name: Butterfree
pokedex: When attacked by other Pokemon it defends itself by scattering its poisonous scales and fluttering its wings.

name: Weedle
pokedex: Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

name: Kakuna
pokedex: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However on the inside it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

name: Beedrill
pokedex: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered they will attack in a furious swarm.

name: Pidgey
pokedex: Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

name: Pidgeotto
pokedex: Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory. This Pokemon flies around patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

name: Pidgeot
pokedex: This Pokemon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head compelling them to choose Pidgeot as their Pokemon.

name: Rattata
pokedex: With their strong capacity for survival they can live in dirty places without concern. Left unchecked their numbers multiply rapidly.

name: Raticate
pokedex: Its disposition is far more violent than its looks would suggest. Dont let your hand get too close to its face as it could bite your hand clean off.

name: Spearow
pokedex: Farmers whose fields are troubled by bug Pokemon appreciate Spearow for its vigorous appetite and look after it.

name: Fearow
pokedex: Drawings of a Pokemon resembling Fearow can be seen in murals from deep in ancient history.

name: Ekans
pokedex: Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.

name: Arbok
pokedex: This Pokemon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.

name: Pikachu
pokedex: Its in its nature to store electricity. It feels stressed now and then if its unable to fully discharge the electricity.

name: Raichu
pokedex: It becomes aggressive when it has electricity stored up. At such times even its Trainer has to take care to avoid being attacked.

name: Sandshrew
pokedex: It usually makes its home in deserts and arid zones where rain does not fall. It digs holes to catch Bug-type Pokemon.

name: Sandslash
pokedex: It uses its claws to climb trees and then curls its body into a spiny ball ready to drop onto any prey that appears.

name: Nidoran♀
pokedex: Nidoran♀ has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokemon. When enraged it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.

name: Nidorina
pokedex: When Nidorina are with their friends or family they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This Pokemon appears to become nervous if separated from the others.

name: Nidoqueen
pokedex: Nidoqueens body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This Pokemon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.

name: Nidoran♂
pokedex: Nidoran♂ has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanks to them the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this Pokemons notice.

name: Nidorino
pokedex: Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence all the barbs on its back bristle up at once and it challenges the foe with all its might.

name: Nidoking
pokedex: Nidokings thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this Pokemon goes on a rampage there is no stopping it.

name: Clefairy
pokedex: On nights with a full moon they gather together and dance. The surrounding area is enveloped in an abnormal magnetic field.

name: Clefable
pokedex: According to tradition people who see a pair of Clefable skipping by can look forward to a happy marriage.

name: Vulpix
pokedex: From its mouth spew flames that seem to resemble the spirits of the deceased. Some people mistakenly think this fire is a ghost.

name: Ninetales
pokedex: Said to live for a thousand years this Pokemon uses its supernatural abilities to manipulate fire. It can burn its prey to a crisp as it pleases.

name: Jigglypuff
pokedex: Jigglypuff possess a vocal range that exceeds 12 octaves but each individuals singing skill depends on its own effort.

name: Wigglytuff
pokedex: As it inhales it expands...and expands...and expands. Wigglytuff compete to see which one can inflate itself the most.

name: Zubat
pokedex: When exposed to sunlight they suffer burns. The frequency of their ultrasonic waves can differ slightly from colony to colony.

name: Golbat
pokedex: Sometimes they drink so much blood they cant fly anymore. Then they fall to the ground and become food for other Pokemon.

name: Oddish
pokedex: Oddish searches for fertile nutrient-rich soil then plants itself. During the daytime while it is planted this Pokemons feet are thought to change shape and become similar to the roots of trees.

name: Gloom
pokedex: From its mouth Gloom drips honey that smells absolutely horrible. Apparently it loves the horrid stench. It sniffs the noxious fumes and then drools even more of its honey.

name: Vileplume
pokedex: Vileplume has the worlds largest petals. They are used to attract prey that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the prey are immobilized this Pokemon catches and devours them.

name: Paras
pokedex: Mushrooms called tochukaso sprout from its back. They can be dried and powdered to make a medicine used to extend life.

name: Parasect
pokedex: It scatters toxic spores from its mushroom cap. Once harvested these spores can be steeped and boiled down to prepare herbal medicines.

name: Venonat
pokedex: Venonat is said to have evolved with a coat of thin stiff hair that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large eyes that never fail to spot even minuscule prey.

name: Venomoth
pokedex: Venomoth is nocturnal—it is a Pokemon that only becomes active at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gather around streetlights attracted by the light in the darkness.

name: Diglett
pokedex: Many farmers cherish and nurture Diglett because its droppings enrich the soil it lives in.

name: Dugtrio
pokedex: Despite the closeness between this Pokemon and farmers and other people no one has ever seen the parts of it concealed underground.

name: Meowth
pokedex: It loves shiny things. It often fights with Murkrow over prey theyre both trying to catch.

name: Persian
pokedex: It has a high opinion of itself although not to the same extent as the Alolan Persian. Its quite difficult to make friends with this Pokemon.

name: Psyduck
pokedex: This Pokemon is troubled by constant headaches. The more pain its in the more powerful its psychokinesis becomes.

name: Golduck
pokedex: It swims along the banks of lakes and catches fish Pokemon. It takes them to the shore and quietly eats them up.

name: Mankey
pokedex: Its raging tires it out and causes it to fall asleep but the anger resonating in its dreams causes it to wake up—which infuriates it all over again.

name: Primeape
pokedex: Some researchers theorize that Primeape remains angry even when inside a Poke Ball.

name: Growlithe
pokedex: It looks cute but when you approach another Trainers Growlithe it will bark at you and bite.

name: Arcanine
pokedex: The fire burning inside its body serves as the energy to fuel it as it runs great distances. It appears in many legends.

name: Poliwag
pokedex: Its still not very good at walking. Its Trainers should train this Pokemon to walk every day.

name: Poliwhirl
pokedex: It marches over the land in search of bug Pokemon to eat. Then it takes them underwater so it can dine on them where its safe.

name: Poliwrath
pokedex: Its percentage of body fat is nearly zero. Its body is entirely muscle which makes it heavy and forces its swimming prowess to develop.

name: Abra
pokedex: It can teleport itself to safety while its asleep but when it wakes it doesnt know where it is so it panics.

name: Kadabra
pokedex: Kadabras presence infests televisions and monitors with creepy shadows that bring bad luck.

name: Alakazam
pokedex: Its brain cells continue to increase in number until its death. The older the Alakazam the larger its head.

name: Machop
pokedex: With its superhuman strength its able to throw a hundred people all at the same time. Its strength comes from lifting Graveler every day.

name: Machoke
pokedex: It willingly assists with hard labor because it knows the work is good training for its muscles.

name: Machamp
pokedex: It can lift heavy loads with the greatest of ease. It can even heft dump trucks. But its clumsy fingers prevent it from doing any precision work.

name: Bellsprout
pokedex: Bellsprouts thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack however strong it may be. From its mouth this Pokemon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

name: Weepinbell
pokedex: Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night the Pokemon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep it may wake up to find itself on the ground.

name: Victreebel
pokedex: Victreebel has a long vine that extends from its head. This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near this Pokemon swallows it whole.

name: Tentacool
pokedex: It drifts in shallow seas such as the areas near beaches. If you get bitten or stabbed by its toxic tentacles rush to the hospital.

name: Tentacruel
pokedex: Although these Pokemon are rare when a large outbreak of them occurs all fish Pokemon disappear from the surrounding sea.

name: Geodude
pokedex: There are plenty of them to be found along any road. A scholar with too much free time once counted a hundred of them along a single route.

name: Graveler
pokedex: This slow-footed Pokemon moves by curling up and rolling instead of walking. With enough momentum its speed can exceed 60 mph.

name: Golem
pokedex: Once a year this Pokemon molts and its shed shell returns to the soil. This process creates enriched soil so farmers collect the shells.

name: Ponyta
pokedex: Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. This Pokemon becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to keep up with its parent.

name: Rapidash
pokedex: Rapidash usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However when this Pokemon turns serious its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.

name: Slowpoke
pokedex: Alolan home cooking involves drying Slowpoke tails and then simmering them into a salty stew.

name: Slowbro
pokedex: Whenever Shellder bites down hard on its tail it gives Slowbro a flash of inspiration...which it forgets a moment later.

name: Magnemite
pokedex: It sends out electromagnetic waves which let it float through the air. Touching it while its eating electricity will give you a full-body shock.

name: Magneton
pokedex: It has about three times the electrical power of Magnemite. For some reason outbreaks of this Pokemon happen when lots of sunspots appear.

name: Farfetch'd
pokedex: Farfetchd is always seen with a stalk from a plant of some sort. Apparently there are good stalks and bad stalks. This Pokemon has been known to fight with others over stalks.

name: Doduo
pokedex: Doduos two heads contain completely identical brains. A scientific study reported that on rare occasions there will be examples of this Pokemon possessing different sets of brains.

name: Dodrio
pokedex: Apparently the heads arent the only parts of the body that Dodrio has three of. It has three sets of hearts and lungs as well so it is capable of running long distances without rest.

name: Seel
pokedex: Seel hunts for prey in the frigid sea underneath sheets of ice. When it needs to breathe it punches a hole through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.

name: Dewgong
pokedex: Dewgong loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this Pokemon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.

name: Grimer
pokedex: It was born from sludge transformed by exposure to X-rays from the moon. When its internal load of germs decreases it dies.

name: Muk
pokedex: After recent environmental improvements this Pokemon is now hardly seen at all. People speculate that it may go extinct at some point.

name: Shellder
pokedex: This Pokemons tongue is always hanging out. It uses its tongue with great dexterity to dig up sand from the seabed in its search for food.

name: Cloyster
pokedex: Excavation of the tombs of ancient hunting tribes has turned up many spears tipped with spikes that had fallen off this Pokemons shell.

name: Gastly
pokedex: Although Gastly is barely visible when its near a faint sweet smell lingers.

name: Haunter
pokedex: It fears the light and revels in the dark. It may be on the verge of extinction in cities that stay brightly lit at night.

name: Gengar
pokedex: It apparently wishes for a traveling companion. Since it was once human itself it tries to create one by taking the lives of other humans.

name: Onix
pokedex: Onix has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this Pokemon does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.

name: Drowzee
pokedex: It finds really fun dreams tasty. When it makes friends with people it may show them the most delicious dreams its ever eaten.

name: Hypno
pokedex: As a matter of course it makes anyone it meets fall asleep and has a taste of their dreams. Anyone having a good dream it carries off.

name: Krabby
pokedex: Krabby live on beaches burrowed inside holes dug into the sand. On sandy beaches with little in the way of food these Pokemon can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.

name: Kingler
pokedex: Kingler has an enormous oversized claw. It waves this huge claw in the air to communicate with others. However because the claw is so heavy the Pokemon quickly tires.

name: Voltorb
pokedex: Voltorb is extremely sensitive—it explodes at the slightest of shocks. It is rumored that it was first created when a Poke Ball was exposed to a powerful pulse of energy.

name: Electrode
pokedex: One of Electrodes characteristics is its attraction to electricity. It is a problematical Pokemon that congregates mostly at electrical power plants to feed on electricity that has just been generated.

name: Exeggcute
pokedex: Six of them together form a full-fledged Pokemon. Its often hunted by Crabrawler but uses psychokinesis to drive it off.

name: Exeggutor
pokedex: When the time comes one of its three heads falls off. Before long the fallen head grows into an Exeggcute.

name: Cubone
pokedex: The skull it wears on its head is that of its dead mother. According to some it will evolve when it comes to terms with the pain of her death.

name: Marowak
pokedex: This Pokemon is out for vengeance on its natural enemy Mandibuzz. It throws bones like boomerangs to try to take it down.

name: Hitmonlee
pokedex: Hitmonlees legs freely contract and stretch. Using these springlike legs it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles to overcome fatigue.

name: Hitmonchan
pokedex: Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had been working toward a world championship. This Pokemon has an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face of adversity.

name: Lickitung
pokedex: Whenever Lickitung comes across something new it will unfailingly give it a lick. It does so because it memorizes things by texture and by taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.

name: Koffing
pokedex: Koffing embodies toxic substances. It mixes the toxins with raw garbage to set off a chemical reaction that results in a terribly powerful poison gas. The higher the temperature the more gas is concocted by this Pokemon.

name: Weezing
pokedex: Weezing alternately shrinks and inflates its twin bodies to mix together toxic gases inside. The more the gases are mixed the more powerful the toxins become. The Pokemon also becomes more putrid.

name: Rhyhorn
pokedex: Rhyhorns brain is very small. It is so dense while on a run it forgets why it started running in the first place. It apparently remembers sometimes if it demolishes something.

name: Rhydon
pokedex: Rhydon has a horn that serves as a drill. It is used for destroying rocks and boulders. This Pokemon occasionally rams into streams of magma but the armor-like hide prevents it from feeling the heat.

name: Chansey
pokedex: Not only are these Pokemon fast runners theyre also few in number so anyone who finds one must be lucky indeed.

name: Tangela
pokedex: Tangelas vines snap off easily if they are grabbed. This happens without pain allowing it to make a quick getaway. The lost vines are replaced by newly grown vines the very next day.

name: Kangaskhan
pokedex: The child in its pouch leaves home after roughly three years. That is the only time the mother is heard to cry wildly.

name: Horsea
pokedex: If Horsea senses danger it will reflexively spray a dense black ink from its mouth and try to escape. This Pokemon swims by cleverly flapping the fin on its back.

name: Seadra
pokedex: Seadra generates whirlpools by spinning its body. The whirlpools are strong enough to swallow even fishing boats. This Pokemon weakens prey with these currents then swallows it whole.

name: Goldeen
pokedex: Spellbound by the length of its horn and the beauty of its fins many strange Trainers raise Goldeen and nothing but Goldeen.

name: Seaking
pokedex: Trainers who are crazy for Seaking are divided into horn enthusiasts and fin enthusiasts. The two groups do not get along well.

name: Staryu
pokedex: This Pokemon gets nibbled on by Lumineon and others. Thanks to its red core it regenerates fast so its unconcerned by their snack attacks.

name: Starmie
pokedex: Its unusual body shape reminiscent of abstract art led local people to spread rumors that this Pokemon may be an invader from outer space.

name: Mr. Mime
pokedex: Mr. Mime is a master of pantomime. Its gestures and motions convince watchers that something unseeable actually exists. Once the watchers are convinced the unseeable thing exists as if it were real.

name: Scyther
pokedex: While young they live together deep in the mountains training themselves in how to fight with their scythes and move at high speeds.

name: Jynx
pokedex: Jynx walks rhythmically swaying and shaking its hips as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without giving any thought to what they are doing.

name: Electabuzz
pokedex: Electricity leaks from it in amounts far greater than the amount of electricity it eats.

name: Magmar
pokedex: When angered it spouts brilliant fire from all over its body. It doesnt calm down until its opponent has burned to ash.

name: Pinsir
pokedex: One solid blow from its horns is enough to split apart a large tree. Its greatest rival in Alola is Vikavolt.

name: Tauros
pokedex: Although its known to be a fierce Pokemon Tauros in the Alola region are said to possess a measure of calmness.

name: Magikarp
pokedex: Its reckless leaps make it easy pickings for predators. On the bright side many Pokemon enjoy longer life spans thanks to Magikarp.

name: Gyarados
pokedex: There are people who swear that any place Gyarados appears is fated for destruction.

name: Lapras
pokedex: These Pokemon were once near extinction due to poaching. Following protective regulations there is now an overabundance of them.

name: Ditto
pokedex: With its astonishing capacity for metamorphosis it can get along with anything. It does not get along well with its fellow Ditto.

name: Eevee
pokedex: Current studies show it can evolve into an incredible eight different species of Pokemon.

name: Vaporeon
pokedex: Blending in with the water and erasing all signs of its presence it patiently waits for its prey fish Pokemon.

name: Jolteon
pokedex: When its fur stands on end thats a sign its about to give off a jolt of electricity. Take care as sometimes lightning strikes next to it too.

name: Flareon
pokedex: Its average body temperature is between 1300 and 1500 degrees Fahrenheit. In its internal flame sac temperatures reach 3000 degrees.

name: Porygon
pokedex: It can convert its body into digital data which enables it to enter cyberspace.

name: Omanyte
pokedex: Omanyte is one of the ancient and long-since-extinct Pokemon that have been regenerated from fossils by people. If attacked by an enemy it withdraws itself inside its hard shell.

name: Omastar
pokedex: Omastar uses its tentacles to capture its prey. It is believed to have become extinct because its shell grew too large and heavy causing its movements to become too slow and ponderous.

name: Kabuto
pokedex: Kabuto is a Pokemon that has been regenerated from a fossil. However in extremely rare cases living examples have been discovered. The Pokemon has not changed at all for 300 million years.

name: Kabutops
pokedex: Kabutops swam underwater to hunt for its prey in ancient times. The Pokemon was apparently evolving from being a water dweller to living on land as evident from the beginnings of change in its gills and legs.

name: Aerodactyl
pokedex: In ancient times it ruled the skies. A widely accepted theory is that it went extinct due to a large meteor impact.

name: Snorlax
pokedex: It eats nearly 900 pounds of food every day. It starts nodding off while eating—and continues to eat even while its asleep.

name: Articuno
pokedex: Articuno is a legendary bird Pokemon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result it is said that when this Pokemon flies snow will fall.

name: Zapdos
pokedex: Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokemon that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. The Pokemon gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.

name: Moltres
pokedex: Moltres is a legendary bird Pokemon that has the ability to control fire. If this Pokemon is injured it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

name: Dratini
pokedex: After a 10-hour struggle a fisherman was able to pull one up and confirm its existence.

name: Dragonair
pokedex: From time immemorial it has been venerated by agricultural peoples as an entity able to control the weather.

name: Dragonite
pokedex: Incur the wrath of this normally calm Pokemon at your peril because it will smash everything to smithereens before its satisfied.

name: Mewtwo
pokedex: Mewtwo is a Pokemon that was created by genetic manipulation. However even though the scientific power of humans created this Pokemons body they failed to endow Mewtwo with a compassionate heart.

name: Mew
pokedex: Mew is said to possess the genetic composition of all Pokemon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.

name: Chikorita
pokedex: In battle Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf becalming the battling Pokemon and creating a cozy friendly atmosphere all around.

name: Bayleef
pokedex: Bayleefs neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.

name: Meganium
pokedex: The fragrance of Meganiums flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle this Pokemon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foes fighting spirit.

name: Cyndaquil
pokedex: Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the Pokemon is angry. However if it is tired the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.

name: Quilava
pokedex: Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This Pokemon applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.

name: Typhlosion
pokedex: Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokemon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

name: Totodile
pokedex: Despite the smallness of its body Totodiles jaws are very powerful. While the Pokemon may think it is just playfully nipping its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.

name: Croconaw
pokedex: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.

name: Feraligatr
pokedex: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.

name: Sentret
pokedex: When Sentret sleeps it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this Pokemon becomes separated from its pack it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.

name: Furret
pokedex: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs this Pokemon is very nimble and fleet.

name: Hoothoot
pokedex: Hoothoot has an internal organ that senses and tracks the earths rotation. Using this special organ this Pokemon begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.

name: Noctowl
pokedex: Noctowl never fails at catching prey in darkness. This Pokemon owes its success to its superior vision that allows it to see in minimal light and to its soft supple wings that make no sound in flight.

name: Ledyba
pokedex: They communicate with one another using bodily fluids that give off odors. When theyre angry their odor smells sour.

name: Ledian
pokedex: In battle it throws punches with all four arms. The power of each individual blow is piddly so it aims to win by quantity rather than quality.

name: Spinarak
pokedex: Some fishermen weave its sturdy thread into nets to catch fish Pokemon.

name: Ariados
pokedex: It spins thread from both its rear and its mouth. Then it wraps its prey up in thread and sips their bodily fluids at its leisure.

name: Crobat
pokedex: Silent and swift in its four-winged flight it bites down on its prey before they realize whats happening. In a heartbeat it drains their blood.

name: Chinchou
pokedex: It lives in the depths beyond the reach of sunlight. It flashes lights on its antennae to communicate with others of its kind.

name: Lanturn
pokedex: This Pokemon flashes a bright light that blinds its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electrical attack.

name: Pichu
pokedex: Despite this Pokemons cute appearance those who want to live with one should prepare to be on the receiving end of its electric jolts.

name: Cleffa
pokedex: Because of its silhouette its believed to be a star reborn. For some reason it loves Minior.

name: Igglybuff
pokedex: It moves by bouncing along. As it moves a lot it sweats and its body gives off a sweet aroma.

name: Togepi
pokedex: As its energy Togepi uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokemon. This Pokemon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell then shares them with others.

name: Togetic
pokedex: Togetic is said to be a Pokemon that brings good fortune. When the Pokemon spots someone who is pure of heart it is said to appear and share its happiness with that person.

name: Natu
pokedex: Natu has a highly developed jumping ability. The Pokemon flaps and leaps onto tree branches that are taller than grown-up people to pick at the trees new shoots.

name: Xatu
pokedex: Xatu is known to stand motionless while staring at the sun all day long. Some people revere it as a mystical Pokemon out of their belief that Xatu is in possession of the power to see into the future.

name: Mareep
pokedex: Mareeps fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static electricity is charged the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.

name: Flaaffy
pokedex: Flaaffys wool quality changes so that it can generate a high amount of static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.

name: Ampharos
pokedex: Ampharos gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used the light of this Pokemon to send signals back and forth with others far away.

name: Bellossom
pokedex: A Bellossom grows flowers more beautifully if it has evolved from a smelly Gloom—the more stinky the better. At night this Pokemon closes its petals and goes to sleep.

name: Marill
pokedex: When fishing for food at the edge of a fast-running stream Marill wraps its tail around the trunk of a tree. This Pokemons tail is flexible and configured to stretch.

name: Azumarill
pokedex: Azumarill can make balloons out of air. It makes these air balloons if it spots a drowning Pokemon. The air balloons enable the Pokemon in trouble to breathe.

name: Sudowoodo
pokedex: Apparently the larger the green parts of this Pokemon the more collectors value it. Its a particular favorite among elderly people.

name: Politoed
pokedex: Its the leader of Poliwag and Poliwhirl. When Politoed roars they all cower in fear.

name: Hoppip
pokedex: This Pokemon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds Hoppip links its leaves with other Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.

name: Skiploom
pokedex: Skiplooms flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason this Pokemon is sometimes used as a thermometer.

name: Jumpluff
pokedex: Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The Pokemon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.

name: Aipom
pokedex: Aipoms tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly manipulated. However because the Pokemon uses its tail so much its real hands have become rather clumsy.

name: Sunkern
pokedex: Sunkern tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing subsisting only on morning dew.

name: Sunflora
pokedex: Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes down for the night.

name: Yanma
pokedex: Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This Pokemon uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.

name: Wooper
pokedex: Wooper usually lives in water. However it occasionally comes out onto land in search of food. On land it coats its body with a gooey toxic film.

name: Quagsire
pokedex: Quagsire hunts for food by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because the Pokemon does not move it does not get very hungry.

name: Espeon
pokedex: It unleashes psychic power from the orb on its forehead. When its power is exhausted the orb grows dull and dark.

name: Umbreon
pokedex: With its black fur it blends into the darkness. It bides its time and when prey appears this Pokemon goes for its throat and then eats it.

name: Murkrow
pokedex: Seen as a symbol of bad luck its generally disliked. Yet it gives presents—objects that sparkle or shine—to Trainers its close to.

name: Slowking
pokedex: This Pokemon is so famed for its intellect that a proverb still persists in some regions: “When in doubt ask Slowking.”

name: Misdreavus
pokedex: If you hear a sobbing sound emanating from a vacant room its undoubtedly a bit of mischief from Misdreavus.

name: Unown
pokedex: This Pokemon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.

name: Wobbuffet
pokedex: Wobbuffet does nothing but endure attacks—it wont attack on its own. However it wont endure an attack on its tail. When that happens the Pokemon will try to take the foe with it using Destiny Bond.

name: Girafarig
pokedex: Girafarigs rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for thinking. However the rear head doesnt need to sleep so it can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.

name: Pineco
pokedex: Pineco hangs from a tree branch and patiently waits for prey to come along. If the Pokemon is disturbed while eating by someone shaking its tree it drops down to the ground and explodes with no warning.

name: Forretress
pokedex: Forretress conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell. The shell is opened when the Pokemon is catching prey but it does so at such a quick pace that the shells inside cannot be seen.

name: Dunsparce
pokedex: Dunsparce has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backward. This Pokemon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.

name: Gligar
pokedex: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This Pokemon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs then injects the prey with its poison barb.

name: Steelix
pokedex: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix. This Pokemon is known to dig toward the earths core. There are records of this Pokemon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.

name: Snubbull
pokedex: Its growls make its opponents uneasy. This laid-back Pokemon tends to sleep half the day.

name: Granbull
pokedex: More timid than Snubbull this Pokemon is doted on by young people amused at the contrast between its looks and its attitude.

name: Qwilfish
pokedex: Qwilfish sucks in water inflating itself. This Pokemon uses the pressure of the water it swallowed to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming somewhat challenging.

name: Scizor
pokedex: Once it has identified an enemy this Pokemon smashes it mercilessly with pincers hard as steel.

name: Shuckle
pokedex: Shuckle quietly hides itself under rocks keeping its body concealed inside its hard shell while eating berries it has stored away. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.

name: Heracross
pokedex: Heracross has sharp claws on its feet. These are planted firmly into the ground or the bark of a tree giving the Pokemon a secure and solid footing to forcefully fling away foes with its proud horn.

name: Sneasel
pokedex: It uses its claws to poke holes in eggs so it can slurp out the insides. Breeders consider it a scourge and will drive it away or eradicate it.

name: Teddiursa
pokedex: This Pokemon likes to lick its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. Teddiursa concocts its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by Beedrill.

name: Ursaring
pokedex: In the forests inhabited by Ursaring it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This Pokemon walks through its forest gathering food every day.

name: Slugma
pokedex: Slugma does not have any blood in its body. Instead intensely hot magma circulates throughout this Pokemons body carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.

name: Magcargo
pokedex: Magcargos body temperature is approximately 18000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact. If this Pokemon is caught in the rain the raindrops instantly turn into steam cloaking the area in a thick fog.

name: Swinub
pokedex: Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This Pokemon occasionally roots out hot springs.

name: Piloswine
pokedex: Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This Pokemon uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.

name: Corsola
pokedex: Pursued by Mareanie for the branches on its head this Pokemon will sometimes snap its own branches off as a diversion while it escapes.

name: Remoraid
pokedex: Remoraid sucks in water then expels it at high velocity using its abdominal muscles to shoot down flying prey. When evolution draws near this Pokemon travels downstream from rivers.

name: Octillery
pokedex: Octillery grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This Pokemon tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong Octillery spews ink to escape.

name: Delibird
pokedex: It has a generous habit of sharing its food with people and Pokemon so its always scrounging around for more food.

name: Mantine
pokedex: On sunny days schools of Mantine can be seen elegantly leaping over the seas waves. This Pokemon is not bothered by the Remoraid that hitches rides.

name: Skarmory
pokedex: Its metal body is sturdy but it does rust rather easily. So on rainy days this Pokemon prefers to stay put in its nest.

name: Houndour
pokedex: Houndour hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This Pokemons remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.

name: Houndoom
pokedex: In a Houndoom pack the one with its horns raked sharply toward the back serves a leadership role. These Pokemon choose their leader by fighting among themselves.

name: Kingdra
pokedex: Kingdra sleeps on the seafloor where it is otherwise devoid of life. When a storm arrives the Pokemon is said to awaken and wander about in search of prey.

name: Phanpy
pokedex: Phanpy uses its long nose to shower itself. When others gather around they thoroughly douse each other with water. These Pokemon can be seen drying their soaking-wet bodies at the edge of water.

name: Donphan
pokedex: If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body even a house could be destroyed. Using its massive strength the Pokemon helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.

name: Porygon2
pokedex: Porygon was updated to a new version in readiness for planetary development. But that dream remains unrealized as yet.

name: Stantler
pokedex: Stantlers magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as works of art. As a result this Pokemon was hunted close to extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.

name: Smeargle
pokedex: It draws symbols all over the place to mark its territory. In towns with many Smeargle the walls are covered in graffiti.

name: Tyrogue
pokedex: Tyrogue becomes stressed out if it does not get to train every day. When raising this Pokemon the Trainer must establish and uphold various training methods.

name: Hitmontop
pokedex: Hitmontop spins on its head at high speed all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The Pokemon travels faster spinning than it does walking.

name: Smoochum
pokedex: Smoochum actively runs about but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasnt become dirty.

name: Elekid
pokedex: This Pokemon is constantly fighting with Togedemaru that try to steal its electricity. Its a pretty even match.

name: Magby
pokedex: A famous potter lives with a Magby. Apparently its soft flames produce fine works.

name: Miltank
pokedex: Most people raise it for its milk but its quite tough and strong so its also well suited for battle.

name: Blissey
pokedex: Its fluffy fur coat acts as a sensor enabling it to read the feelings of people and Pokemon.

name: Raikou
pokedex: Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this Pokemon send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.

name: Entei
pokedex: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokemon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.

name: Suicune
pokedex: Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokemon has the power to purify dirty water.

name: Larvitar
pokedex: Larvitar is born deep under the ground. To come up to the surface this Pokemon must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so Larvitar cannot see its parents.

name: Pupitar
pokedex: Pupitar creates a gas inside its body that it compresses and forcefully ejects to propel itself like a jet. The body is very durable—it avoids damage even if it hits solid steel.

name: Tyranitar
pokedex: Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. This Pokemon wanders about in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.

name: Lugia
pokedex: Lugias wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result this Pokemon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

name: Celebi
pokedex: This Pokemon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears a bright and shining future awaits us.

name: Treecko
pokedex: Treecko is cool calm and collected—it never panics under any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this Pokemon it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.

name: Grovyle
pokedex: This Pokemon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest no Pokemon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.

name: Sceptile
pokedex: Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokemon raises the trees in a forest with loving care.

name: Torchic
pokedex: Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokemon is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.

name: Combusken
pokedex: Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This Pokemons cry is very loud and distracting.

name: Blaziken
pokedex: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokemons blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.

name: Mudkip
pokedex: In water Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle this Pokemon will unleash its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.

name: Marshtomp
pokedex: Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This Pokemons hindquarters exhibit obvious development giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.

name: Swampert
pokedex: Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching it piles up boulders to protect itself.

name: Poochyena
pokedex: Poochyena is an omnivore—it will eat anything. A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This Pokemon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its tail bristle out.

name: Mightyena
pokedex: Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the Pokemon to obey only those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.

name: Zigzagoon
pokedex: The hair on Zigzagoons back is bristly. It rubs the hard back hair against trees to leave its territorial markings. This Pokemon may play dead to fool foes in battle.

name: Linoone
pokedex: When hunting Linoone will make a beeline straight for the prey at a full run. While this Pokemon is capable of topping 60 mph it has to come to a screeching halt before it can turn.

name: Wurmple
pokedex: Wurmple is targeted by Swellow as prey. This Pokemon will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison from the spikes.

name: Silcoon
pokedex: Silcoon was thought to endure hunger and not consume anything before its evolution. However it is now thought that this Pokemon slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater that collects on its silk.

name: Beautifly
pokedex: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokemon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.

name: Cascoon
pokedex: If it is attacked Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pokemon will also not forget the pain it endured.

name: Dustox
pokedex: When Dustox flaps its wings a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This Pokemon searches for food using its antennae like radar.

name: Lotad
pokedex: Lotad is said to have dwelled on land before. However this Pokemon is thought to have returned to water because the leaf on its head grew large and heavy. It now lives by floating atop the water.

name: Lombre
pokedex: Lombres entire body is covered by a slippery slimy film. It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by this Pokemons hands. Lombre is often mistaken for a human child.

name: Ludicolo
pokedex: Upon hearing an upbeat and cheerful rhythm the cells in Ludicolos body become very energetic and active. Even in battle this Pokemon will exhibit an amazing amount of power.

name: Seedot
pokedex: Seedot looks exactly like an acorn when it is dangling from a tree branch. It startles other Pokemon by suddenly moving. This Pokemon polishes its body once a day using leaves.

name: Nuzleaf
pokedex: This Pokemon pulls out the leaf on its head and makes a flute with it. The sound of Nuzleafs flute strikes fear and uncertainty in the hearts of people lost in a forest.

name: Shiftry
pokedex: Shiftrys large fans generate awesome gusts of wind at a speed close to 100 feet per second. The whipped-up wind blows anything away. This Pokemon chooses to live quietly deep in forests.

name: Taillow
pokedex: Taillow is young—it has only just left its nest. As a result it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night. This Pokemon feeds on Wurmple that live in forests.

name: Swellow
pokedex: Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two Swellow are gathered they diligently take care of cleaning each others wings.

name: Wingull
pokedex: Fishermen keep an eye out for Wingull in the sky because wherever theyre circling the ocean is sure to be teeming with fish Pokemon.

name: Pelipper
pokedex: Gathering food is the work of young males. They store food in their capacious beaks and carry it back to others waiting in the nest.

name: Ralts
pokedex: Ralts has the ability to sense the emotions of people. If its Trainer is in a cheerful mood this Pokemon grows cheerful and joyous in the same way.

name: Kirlia
pokedex: Kirlia uses the horns on its head to amplify its psychokinetic power. When the Pokemon uses its power the air around it becomes distorted creating mirages of nonexistent scenery.

name: Gardevoir
pokedex: Gardevoir has the psychokinetic power to distort the dimensions and create a small black hole. This Pokemon will try to protect its Trainer even at the risk of its own life.

name: Surskit
pokedex: When this Pokemon senses danger a sweet fluid oozes from the tip of its head. The taste of it disgusts bird Pokemon.

name: Masquerain
pokedex: Its wings and antennae dont cope well with moisture. After a rain it faces sunward to dry off.

name: Shroomish
pokedex: If Shroomish senses danger it shakes its body and scatters spores from the top of its head. This Pokemons spores are so toxic they make trees and weeds wilt.

name: Breloom
pokedex: The seeds ringing Brelooms tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this Pokemons seed will cause your stomach to rumble.

name: Slakoth
pokedex: Slakoths heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this Pokemon in motion.

name: Vigoroth
pokedex: Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it tries to sleep the blood in its veins grows agitated compelling this Pokemon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can settle down.

name: Slaking
pokedex: Wherever Slaking live rings of over a yard in diameter appear in grassy fields. They are made by the Pokemon as it eats all the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.

name: Nincada
pokedex: Nincada lives underground. It uses its sharp claws to carve the roots of trees and absorb moisture and nutrients. This Pokemon cant withstand bright sunlight so avoids it.

name: Ninjask
pokedex: If Ninjask is not trained properly it will refuse to obey the Trainer and cry loudly continuously. Because of this quality this Pokemon is said to be one that puts the Trainers abilities to the test.

name: Shedinja
pokedex: Shedinja is a peculiar Pokemon. It seems to appear unsought in a Poke Ball after a Nincada evolves. This bizarre Pokemon is entirely immobile—it doesnt even breathe.

name: Whismur
pokedex: Whismur is very timid. If it starts to cry loudly it becomes startled by its own crying and cries even harder. When it finally stops crying the Pokemon goes to sleep all tired out.

name: Loudred
pokedex: Loudred shouts while stamping its feet. After it finishes shouting this Pokemon becomes incapable of hearing anything for a while. This is considered to be a weak point.

name: Exploud
pokedex: Exploud communicates its feelings to the others by emitting whistle-like sounds from the tubes on its body. This Pokemon only raises its voice when it is in battle.

name: Makuhita
pokedex: Their daily routine consists of training together first thing in the morning eating and napping in the afternoon and then more training afterward.

name: Hariyama
pokedex: They love to compare their freakish strength— strength enough to send a truck flying with a single slap.

name: Azurill
pokedex: Azurills tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the nutrients this Pokemon needs to grow. Azurill can be seen bouncing and playing on its big rubbery tail.

name: Nosepass
pokedex: It uses powerful magnetism to drag its prey toward it. Its also been known to pull in metal which it collects and uses to protect itself.

name: Skitty
pokedex: Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail. In the wild this Pokemon lives in holes in the trees of forests. It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.

name: Delcatty
pokedex: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokemon approach it as it sleeps this Pokemon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.

name: Sableye
pokedex: This Pokemon is feared. When its gemstone eyes begin to glow with a sinister shine its believed that Sableye will steal peoples spirits away.

name: Mawile
pokedex: Dont be taken in by this Pokemons cute face—its very dangerous. Mawile fools the foe into letting down its guard then chomps down with its massive jaws. The steel jaws are really horns that have been transformed.

name: Aron
pokedex: Aron has a body of steel. With one all-out charge this Pokemon can demolish even a heavy dump truck. The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal for the Pokemon.

name: Lairon
pokedex: Lairon feeds on iron contained in rocks and water. It makes its nest on mountains where iron ore is buried. As a result the Pokemon often clashes with humans mining the iron ore.

name: Aggron
pokedex: Aggron is protective of its environment. If its mountain is ravaged by a landslide or a fire this Pokemon will haul topsoil to the area plant trees and beautifully restore its own territory.

name: Meditite
pokedex: Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this Pokemons training.

name: Medicham
pokedex: Through the power of meditation Medicham developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokemon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.

name: Electrike
pokedex: Electrike runs faster than the human eye can follow. The friction from running is converted into electricity which is then stored in this Pokemons fur.

name: Manectric
pokedex: Manectric discharges strong electricity from its mane. The mane is used for collecting electricity in the atmosphere. This Pokemon creates thunderclouds above its head.

name: Plusle
pokedex: When Plusle is cheering on its partner it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses this Pokemon cries loudly.

name: Minun
pokedex: Minun loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble this Pokemon gives off increasing amounts of sparks.

name: Volbeat
pokedex: Volbeats tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky. This Pokemon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.

name: Illumise
pokedex: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokemon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.

name: Roselia
pokedex: On extremely rare occasions a Roselia is said to appear with its flowers in unusual colors. The thorns on this Pokemons head contain a vicious poison.

name: Gulpin
pokedex: Most of Gulpins body is made up of its stomach—its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This Pokemons stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.

name: Swalot
pokedex: Swalot has no teeth so what it eats it swallows whole no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this Pokemons mouth.

name: Carvanha
pokedex: If they scent the faintest trace of blood they rush to attack en masse. When alone theyre rather cowardly.

name: Sharpedo
pokedex: It has a sad history. In the past its dorsal fin was a treasured foodstuff so this Pokemon became a victim of overfishing.

name: Wailmer
pokedex: It shows off by spraying jets of seawater from the nostrils above its eyes. It eats a solid ton of Wishiwashi every day.

name: Wailord
pokedex: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.

name: Numel
pokedex: Numel stores magma of almost 2200 degrees Fahrenheit within its body. If it gets wet the magma cools and hardens. In that event the Pokemons body grows heavy and its movements become sluggish.

name: Camerupt
pokedex: The humps on Camerupts back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokemon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.

name: Torkoal
pokedex: If the fire burning within its shell goes out it will die. Those who wish to raise one in their home must always keep something flammable at hand.

name: Spoink
pokedex: Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to amplify this Pokemons psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on a constant search for a bigger pearl.

name: Grumpig
pokedex: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so it dances bizarrely. This Pokemons black pearls are valuable as works of art.

name: Spinda
pokedex: Each and every Spinda has a slightly different configuration of spots. There are collectors who enjoy the tiny differences in their spot patterns.

name: Trapinch
pokedex: As it digs through the sand its giant jaws crush any rocks that obstruct its path. It builds a funnel-shaped nest.

name: Vibrava
pokedex: To help make its wings grow it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.

name: Flygon
pokedex: This Pokemon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.

name: Cacnea
pokedex: The more arid and harsh the environment the more pretty and fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokemon battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.

name: Cacturne
pokedex: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokemon are biding their time waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.

name: Swablu
pokedex: Swablu loves to make things clean. If it spots something dirty it will wipe and polish it with its cottony wings. If its wings become dirty this Pokemon finds a stream and showers itself.

name: Altaria
pokedex: Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This Pokemon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.

name: Zangoose
pokedex: Zangoose usually stays on all fours but when angered it gets up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This Pokemon shares a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.

name: Seviper
pokedex: Sevipers swordlike tail serves two purposes—it slashes foes and douses them with secreted poison. This Pokemon will not give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.

name: Lunatone
pokedex: Lunatone becomes active around the time of the full moon. Instead of walking it moves by floating in midair. The Pokemons intimidating red eyes cause all those who see it to become transfixed with fear.

name: Solrock
pokedex: Sunlight is the source of Solrocks power. It is said to possess the ability to read the emotions of others. This Pokemon gives off intense heat while rotating its body.

name: Barboach
pokedex: Its slippery body is hard to grasp so much so that there are festivals where people compete to see how many they can catch barehanded.

name: Whiscash
pokedex: Sighting Whiscash leaping from the water is believed to herald an earthquake.

name: Corphish
pokedex: Corphish catches prey with its sharp claws. It has no likes or dislikes when it comes to food—it will eat anything. This Pokemon has no trouble living in filthy water.

name: Crawdaunt
pokedex: Crawdaunt molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens this Pokemon hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.

name: Baltoy
pokedex: As soon as it spots others of its kind Baltoy congregates with them and then begins crying noisily in unison. This Pokemon sleeps while cleverly balancing itself on its one foot.

name: Claydol
pokedex: Claydol is an enigma that appeared from a clay statue made by an ancient civilization dating back 20000 years. This Pokemon shoots beams from both its hands.

name: Lileep
pokedex: Lileep is an ancient Pokemon that was regenerated from a fossil. It remains permanently anchored to a rock. From its immobile perch this Pokemon intently scans for prey with its two eyes.

name: Cradily
pokedex: Cradilys body serves as an anchor preventing it from being washed away in rough seas. This Pokemon secretes a strong digestive fluid from its tentacles.

name: Anorith
pokedex: Anorith is said to be a type of Pokemon predecessor with eight wings at the sides of its body. This Pokemon swam in the primordial sea by undulating these eight wings.

name: Armaldo
pokedex: Armaldo is a Pokemon species that became extinct in prehistoric times. This Pokemon is said to have walked on its hind legs which would have been more convenient for life on land.

name: Feebas
pokedex: Although unattractive and unpopular this Pokemons marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.

name: Milotic
pokedex: It lives at the bottom of clear lakes. In times of war it shows itself which soothes peoples minds and hearts.

name: Castform
pokedex: Its form changes on its own due to its cells sensitive reactions to temperature and humidity.

name: Kecleon
pokedex: Kecleon alters its body coloration to blend in with its surroundings allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.

name: Shuppet
pokedex: Shuppet grows by feeding on dark emotions such as vengefulness and envy in the hearts of people. It roams through cities in search of grudges that taint people.

name: Banette
pokedex: A cursed energy permeated the stuffing of a discarded and forgotten plush doll giving it new life as Banette. The Pokemons energy would escape if it were to ever open its mouth.

name: Duskull
pokedex: Duskull wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight. There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving children that this Pokemon will spirit away bad children who earn scoldings from their mothers.

name: Dusclops
pokedex: Dusclops absorbs anything however large the object may be. This Pokemon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclopss bidding.

name: Tropius
pokedex: Children of the southern tropics eat as snacks the fruit that grows in bunches around the neck of Tropius. This Pokemon flies by flapping the leaves on its back as if they were wings.

name: Chimecho
pokedex: In high winds Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This Pokemon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.

name: Absol
pokedex: Although its said to bring disaster in actuality this Pokemon possesses a calm disposition and warns people of any crises that loom.

name: Wynaut
pokedex: Wynaut gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed this Pokemon gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.

name: Snorunt
pokedex: It can only survive in cold areas. It bounces happily around even in environments as cold as -150 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Glalie
pokedex: Its prey is instantaneously frozen stiff by the cold air it exhales from its huge mouth. While theyre in that frozen state it gobbles them up.

name: Spheal
pokedex: Spheal always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body. When the season for ice floes arrives this Pokemon can be seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.

name: Sealeo
pokedex: Sealeo often balances and rolls things on the tip of its nose. While the Pokemon is rolling something it checks the objects aroma and texture to determine whether it likes the object or not.

name: Walrein
pokedex: Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.

name: Clamperl
pokedex: Clamperl grows while being protected by its rock-hard shell. When its body becomes too large to fit inside the shell it is sure evidence that this Pokemon is getting close to evolution.

name: Huntail
pokedex: Huntails tail is shaped like a fish. It uses the tail to attract prey then swallows the prey whole with its large gaping mouth. This Pokemon swims by wiggling its slender body like a snake.

name: Gorebyss
pokedex: Although Gorebyss is the very picture of elegance and beauty while swimming it is also cruel. When it spots prey this Pokemon inserts its thin mouth into the preys body and drains the prey of its body fluids.

name: Relicanth
pokedex: It was fortuitously discovered during a deep sea expedition. Its teeth have atrophied so it now survives on microscopic organisms it sucks up.

name: Luvdisc
pokedex: Loving couples have a soft spot for this Pokemon so honeymoon hotels often release this Pokemon into their pools.

name: Bagon
pokedex: With its steel-hard stone head it headbutts indiscriminately. This is because of the stress it feels at being unable to fly.

name: Shelgon
pokedex: They lurk deep within caves—motionless neither eating nor drinking. Why they dont die is not known.

name: Salamence
pokedex: It flies around on its wings which have grown in at last. In its happiness it gushes hot flames burning up the fields it passes over.

name: Beldum
pokedex: With magnetic traction it pulls its opponents in close. When theyre in range it slashes them with its rear claws.

name: Metang
pokedex: It adores magnetic minerals so it pursues Nosepass at speeds exceeding 60 mph.

name: Metagross
pokedex: A linkage of two Metang this Pokemon can perform any calculation in a flash by utilizing parallel processing in its four brains.

name: Regirock
pokedex: Regirocks body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently a study made the startling discovery that the rocks were all unearthed from different locations.

name: Regice
pokedex: Regice cloaks itself with frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit. Things will freeze solid just by going near this Pokemon. Its icy body is so cold it will not melt even if it is immersed in magma.

name: Registeel
pokedex: Registeel was imprisoned by people in ancient times. The metal composing its body is thought to be a curious substance that is not of this earth.

name: Latias
pokedex: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokemon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.

name: Latios
pokedex: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pokemon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.

name: Kyogre
pokedex: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: Groudon
pokedex: Through Primal Reversion and with natures full power it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.

name: Rayquaza
pokedex: It flies forever through the ozone layer consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

name: Jirachi
pokedex: Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that people desire.

name: Deoxys
pokedex: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokemon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

name: Turtwig
pokedex: It undertakes photosynthesis with its body making oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.

name: Grotle
pokedex: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokemon there on its back.

name: Torterra
pokedex: Small Pokemon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

name: Chimchar
pokedex: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

name: Monferno
pokedex: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.

name: Infernape
pokedex: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.

name: Piplup
pokedex: Because it is very proud it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

name: Prinplup
pokedex: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.

name: Empoleon
pokedex: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

name: Starly
pokedex: They flock around mountains and fields chasing after bug Pokemon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

name: Staravia
pokedex: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.

name: Staraptor
pokedex: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

name: Bidoof
pokedex: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

name: Bibarel
pokedex: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

name: Kricketot
pokedex: When its antennae hit each other it sounds like the music of a xylophone.

name: Kricketune
pokedex: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns.

name: Shinx
pokedex: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.

name: Luxio
pokedex: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

name: Luxray
pokedex: When its eyes gleam gold it can spot hiding prey—even those taking shelter behind a wall.

name: Budew
pokedex: Over the winter it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring the bud opens and releases pollen.

name: Roserade
pokedex: With the movements of a dancer it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.

name: Cranidos
pokedex: In rock layers where Cranidos fossils are found the fossilized trunks of trees snapped in two are also often found.

name: Rampardos
pokedex: Records exist of a revived fossil that evolved into Rampardos. It proceeded to escape and then destroy a skyscraper with a headbutt.

name: Shieldon
pokedex: This Pokemon lived in primeval jungles. Few enemies would have been willing to square off against its heavily armored face so its thought.

name: Bastiodon
pokedex: It lived in the same environments as Rampardos. Their fossils have been found together— seemingly from after theyd fought to the finish.

name: Burmy
pokedex: If its cloak is broken in battle it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

name: Wormadam
pokedex: When Burmy evolved its cloak became a part of this Pokemons body. The cloak is never shed.

name: Mothim
pokedex: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

name: Combee
pokedex: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

name: Vespiquen
pokedex: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.

name: Pachirisu
pokedex: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

name: Buizel
pokedex: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.

name: Floatzel
pokedex: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.

name: Cherubi
pokedex: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.

name: Cherrim
pokedex: If it senses strong sunlight it opens its folded petals to absorb the suns rays with its whole body.

name: Shellos
pokedex: Purple mucus sticks to the hands of anyone who touches it. Take care as the substance is troublesome to wash off.

name: Gastrodon
pokedex: Plankton invisible to the naked eye is its main food source. It comes onto the land periodically but the reason for this is not known.

name: Ambipom
pokedex: To eat it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

name: Drifloon
pokedex: If for some reason its body bursts its soul spills out with a screaming sound.

name: Drifblim
pokedex: Even while under careful observation large flocks of Drifblim flying at dusk will inexplicably disappear from view.

name: Buneary
pokedex: When it senses danger it perks up its ears. On cold nights it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.

name: Lopunny
pokedex: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly it kicks with its graceful legs.

name: Mismagius
pokedex: Mismagius have been known to cast spells to make people fall in love so some people search for this Pokemon as if their life depended on it.

name: Honchkrow
pokedex: If its Murkrow cronies fail to catch food for it or if it feels they have betrayed it it will hunt them down wherever they are and punish them.

name: Glameow
pokedex: When its happy Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail like a dancing ribbon.

name: Purugly
pokedex: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.

name: Chingling
pokedex: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

name: Stunky
pokedex: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

name: Skuntank
pokedex: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.

name: Bronzor
pokedex: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

name: Bronzong
pokedex: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.

name: Bonsly
pokedex: From its eyes it can expel excess moisture from its body. This liquid is similar in composition to human sweat.

name: Mime Jr.
pokedex: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokemon.

name: Happiny
pokedex: Its too small to lay eggs yet. As a surrogate it searches out round white stones.

name: Chatot
pokedex: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather they all learn the same saying.

name: Spiritomb
pokedex: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.

name: Gible
pokedex: It skulks in caves and when prey or an enemy passes by it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Gabite
pokedex: Shiny objects are its passion. It can be found in its cave scarcely moving its gaze fixed on the jewels its amassed or Carbink it has caught.

name: Garchomp
pokedex: The protuberances on its head serve as sensors. It can even detect distant prey.

name: Munchlax
pokedex: When it finds something that looks like it might be edible it goes right ahead and swallows it whole. Thats why it gets fatter day by day.

name: Riolu
pokedex: Its tough enough to run right through the night and its also a hard worker but its still just a youngster.

name: Lucario
pokedex: They can detect the species of a living being— and its emotions—from over half a mile away. They control auras and hunt their prey in packs.

name: Hippopotas
pokedex: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.

name: Hippowdon
pokedex: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

name: Skorupi
pokedex: It burrows under the sand to lie in wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject its prey with a savage poison.

name: Drapion
pokedex: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

name: Croagunk
pokedex: Inflating its poison sacs it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

name: Toxicroak
pokedex: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.

name: Carnivine
pokedex: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

name: Finneon
pokedex: Its double tail fins propel its energetic jumps. When it breaks the surface of the sea Wingull swoop down to grab it on the fly.

name: Lumineon
pokedex: This deep-sea Pokemon lives at the bottom of the sea. Its fins haul it over the seabed in search of its favorite food—Starmie.

name: Mantyke
pokedex: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back.

name: Snover
pokedex: In the spring it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.

name: Abomasnow
pokedex: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

name: Weavile
pokedex: They dwell in cold places. This Pokemons main food source in Alola is Vulpix and Sandshrew which they carefully divide among their group.

name: Magnezone
pokedex: As it zooms through the sky this Pokemon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

name: Lickilicky
pokedex: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.

name: Rhyperior
pokedex: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.

name: Tangrowth
pokedex: Its vines grow so profusely that in the warm season you cant even see its eyes.

name: Electivire
pokedex: When it gets excited it thumps its chest. With every thud thunder roars and electric sparks shower all around.

name: Magmortar
pokedex: From its arm it launches fireballs hotter than 3500 degrees Fahrenheit. Its arm starts to melt when it fires a whole barrage.

name: Togekiss
pokedex: It shares many blessings with people who respect one anothers rights and avoid needless strife.

name: Yanmega
