pokedex: This six-legged Pokemon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.

name: Leafeon
pokedex: The younger they are the more they smell like fresh grass. With age their fragrance takes on the odor of fallen leaves.

name: Glaceon
pokedex: It freezes its fur into icicles spiky and sharp and tackles its prey.

name: Gliscor
pokedex: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.

name: Mamoswine
pokedex: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

name: Porygon-Z
pokedex: Its program was modified to facilitate extra-dimensional activities but that led to noticeably strange behavior.

name: Gallade
pokedex: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

name: Probopass
pokedex: The main body controls three mobile units called Mini-Noses which it maneuvers to catch prey.

name: Dusknoir
pokedex: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

name: Froslass
pokedex: The soul of a woman lost on a snowy mountain possessed an icicle becoming this Pokemon. The food it most relishes is the souls of men.

name: Rotom
pokedex: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

name: Uxie
pokedex: It is said that its emergence gave humans the intelligence to improve their quality of life.

name: Mesprit
pokedex: It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to leave its body to fly on the lakes surface.

name: Azelf
pokedex: It is thought that Uxie Mesprit and Azelf all came from the same egg.

name: Dialga
pokedex: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

name: Palkia
pokedex: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

name: Heatran
pokedex: Boiling blood like magma circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

name: Regigigas
pokedex: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokemon towed continents with ropes.

name: Giratina
pokedex: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

name: Cresselia
pokedex: Those who sleep holding Cresselias feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Phione
pokedex: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born no matter how far it may have drifted.

name: Manaphy
pokedex: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokemon.

name: Darkrai
pokedex: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

name: Shaymin
pokedex: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.

name: Arceus
pokedex: It is told in mythology that this Pokemon was born before the universe even existed.

name: Victini
pokedex: When it shares the infinite energy it creates that beings entire body will be overflowing with power.

name: Snivy
pokedex: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well their tails droop.

name: Servine
pokedex: When it gets dirty its leaves cant be used in photosynthesis so it always keeps itself clean.

name: Serperior
pokedex: It can stop its opponents movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

name: Tepig
pokedex: It loves to eat roasted berries but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

name: Pignite
pokedex: When its internal fire flares up its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble it emits smoke.

name: Emboar
pokedex: It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves. It grows a beard of fire.

name: Oshawott
pokedex: The scalchop on its stomach isnt just used for battle—it can be used to break open hard berries as well.

name: Dewott
pokedex: As a result of strict training each Dewott learns different forms for using the scalchops.

name: Samurott
pokedex: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

name: Patrat
pokedex: Extremely cautious one of them will always be on the lookout but it wont notice a foe coming from behind.

name: Watchog
pokedex: When they see an enemy their tails stand high and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.

name: Lillipup
pokedex: The long fur surrounding its face functions as radar enabling it to probe the condition of its battle opponents.

name: Herdier
pokedex: This Pokemon obeys its masters orders faithfully. However it refuses to listen to anything said by a person it doesnt respect.

name: Stoutland
pokedex: With this wise Pokemon there could be no concern that it would ever attack people. Some parents even trust it to babysit.

name: Purrloin
pokedex: They steal from people for fun but their victims cant help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.

name: Liepard
pokedex: Stealthily it sneaks up on its target striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.

name: Pansage
pokedex: Its good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. Its kind enough to share them with friends.

name: Simisage
pokedex: Ill tempered it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

name: Pansear
pokedex: This Pokemon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Simisear
pokedex: When it gets excited embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason it loves sweets.

name: Panpour
pokedex: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

name: Simipour
pokedex: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.

name: Munna
pokedex: It eats the dreams of people and Pokemon. When it eats a pleasant dream it expels pink-colored mist.

name: Musharna
pokedex: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.

name: Pidove
pokedex: These Pokemon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.

name: Tranquill
pokedex: No matter where in the world it goes it knows where its nest is so it never gets separated from its Trainer.

name: Unfezant
pokedex: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.

name: Blitzle
pokedex: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.

name: Zebstrika
pokedex: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed the sound of thunder reverberates.

name: Roggenrola
pokedex: The hexagonal cavity is its ear. It walks in the direction of sounds it hears but if the sounds cease it panics and topples over.

name: Boldore
pokedex: It explores caves in search of underground water. Its not comfortable around water so this Pokemon takes great care in lapping it up.

name: Gigalith
pokedex: Known for its hefty horsepower this Pokemon is a popular partner for construction workers.

name: Woobat
pokedex: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.

name: Swoobat
pokedex: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.

name: Drilbur
pokedex: By spinning its body it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.

name: Excadrill
pokedex: More than 300 feet below the surface they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.

name: Audino
pokedex: It touches others with the feelers on its ears using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

name: Timburr
pokedex: Always carrying squared logs they help out with construction. As they grow they carry bigger logs.

name: Gurdurr
pokedex: This Pokemon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

name: Conkeldurr
pokedex: Rather than rely on force they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

name: Tympole
pokedex: By vibrating its cheeks it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.

name: Palpitoad
pokedex: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.

name: Seismitoad
pokedex: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

name: Throh
pokedex: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.

name: Sawk
pokedex: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.

name: Sewaddle
pokedex: Since this Pokemon makes its own clothes out of leaves it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

name: Swadloon
pokedex: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move eating leaves in forests.

name: Leavanny
pokedex: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.

name: Venipede
pokedex: Its bite injects a potent poison enough to paralyze large bird Pokemon that try to prey on it.

name: Whirlipede
pokedex: It is usually motionless but when attacked it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.

name: Scolipede
pokedex: With quick movements it chases down its foes attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

name: Cottonee
pokedex: Pillows and beds stuffed with cotton exhaled by Cottonee are soft and puffy light and airy— altogether top quality.

name: Whimsicott
pokedex: This Pokemon appears riding upon the wind. But if the wind gusts up itll blow the cotton on this Pokemons head clean off.

name: Petilil
pokedex: By pruning the leaves on its head with regularity this Pokemon can be grown into a fine plump shape.

name: Lilligant
pokedex: As soon as it finds a male to be its partner the beautiful flower on its head darkens droops and withers away.

name: Basculin
pokedex: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along but sometimes members of one school mingle with the others school.

name: Sandile
pokedex: It conceals itself in the sand and chomps down on the legs of any prey that unwarily walk over it. Its favorite food is Trapinch.

name: Krokorok
pokedex: Thanks to the special membrane covering its eyes it can see its surroundings clearly even in the middle of the night.

name: Krookodile
pokedex: After clamping down with its powerful jaws it twists its body around to rip its prey in half.

name: Darumaka
pokedex: When it sleeps it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1100 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Darmanitan
pokedex: Its internal fire burns at 2500 degrees Fahrenheit making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

name: Maractus
pokedex: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically making a sound similar to maracas.

name: Dwebble
pokedex: When it finds a stone of a suitable size it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.

name: Crustle
pokedex: Competing for territory Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.

name: Scraggy
pokedex: Proud of its sturdy skull it suddenly headbutts everything but its weight makes it unstable too.

name: Scrafty
pokedex: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.

name: Sigilyph
pokedex: The guardians of an ancient city they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.

name: Yamask
pokedex: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

name: Cofagrigus
pokedex: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

name: Tirtouga
pokedex: Reputed to be the ancestor of most turtle Pokemon it lived in warm seas approximately a hundred million years ago.

name: Carracosta
pokedex: Active both on land and in the sea this Pokemon drags its land-based prey into the water to finish it off.

name: Archen
pokedex: To all appearances flightless it was able to glide down from tall treetops to snag its prey.

name: Archeops
pokedex: They hunted in flocks. When one Archeops had the prey cornered another would swoop on it.

name: Trubbish
pokedex: It gorges on trash until its stomach is full. Then it belches toxic gas. An unlucky whiff of gas will put a person in the hospital.

name: Garbodor
pokedex: For a time their numbers increased explosively in Alola. Since the arrival of Grimer their population has decreased dramatically.

name: Zorua
pokedex: To protect themselves from danger they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokemon.

name: Zoroark
pokedex: Bonds between these Pokemon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

name: Minccino
pokedex: These Pokemon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting using their tails as brooms.

name: Cinccino
pokedex: Cinccinos body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks such as punches.

name: Gothita
pokedex: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokemon. Apparently they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.

name: Gothorita
pokedex: According to many old tales it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.

name: Gothitelle
pokedex: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers life spans.

name: Solosis
pokedex: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

name: Duosion
pokedex: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts their psychic power is maximized.

name: Reuniclus
pokedex: When Reuniclus shake hands a network forms between their brains increasing their psychic power.

name: Ducklett
pokedex: They are better at swimming than flying and they happily eat their favorite food peat moss as they dive underwater.

name: Swanna
pokedex: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

name: Vanillite
pokedex: It feels pleasantly cool when embraced. This Pokemon is treasured by households in warm regions.

name: Vanillish
pokedex: This Pokemon has existed since the Ice Age. It controls particles of ice freezes its opponents and then shatters them with a headbutt.

name: Vanilluxe
pokedex: Even if it loses one of its heads it can live relatively problem-free. It makes snow clouds inside its body.

name: Deerling
pokedex: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokemons fur. People use it to mark the seasons.

name: Sawsbuck
pokedex: They migrate according to the seasons so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

name: Emolga
pokedex: It grills berries and bug Pokemon with electric shocks and makes a meal of them. It usually nests in the holes gouged in trees by Pikipek.

name: Karrablast
pokedex: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.

name: Escavalier
pokedex: These Pokemon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.

name: Foongus
pokedex: It lures Pokemon with its pattern that looks just like a Poke Ball then releases poison spores.

name: Amoonguss
pokedex: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps which resemble Poke Balls in a swaying motion.

name: Frillish
pokedex: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe that foe will be dragged miles below the surface never to return.

name: Jellicent
pokedex: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicents habitat: all sunken all lost all vanished.

name: Alomomola
pokedex: They float upon the open sea. Many water Pokemon gather in the area around Alomomola.

name: Joltik
pokedex: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokemon and absorb static electricity which they store in an electric pouch.

name: Galvantula
pokedex: When attacked they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

name: Ferroseed
pokedex: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.

name: Ferrothorn
pokedex: They attach themselves to cave ceilings firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.

name: Klink
pokedex: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

name: Klang
pokedex: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesnt return it will die.

name: Klinklang
pokedex: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.

name: Tynamo
pokedex: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.

name: Eelektrik
pokedex: These Pokemon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.

name: Eelektross
pokedex: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

name: Elgyem
pokedex: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.

name: Beheeyem
pokedex: It uses psychic power to control an opponents brain and tamper with its memories.

name: Litwick
pokedex: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokemon which becomes the fuel that it burns.

name: Lampent
pokedex: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.

name: Chandelure
pokedex: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.

name: Axew
pokedex: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks a new one grows in quickly.

name: Fraxure
pokedex: A broken tusk will not grow back so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.

name: Haxorus
pokedex: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokemon are covered in hard armor.

name: Cubchoo
pokedex: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.

name: Beartic
pokedex: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.

name: Cryogonal
pokedex: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice freezing the prey at -148 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Shelmet
pokedex: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.

name: Accelgor
pokedex: When its body dries out it weakens. So to prevent dehydration it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

name: Stunfisk
pokedex: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it it delivers a jolt of electricity.

name: Mienfoo
pokedex: In fights they dominate with onslaughts of flowing continuous attacks. With their sharp claws they cut enemies.

name: Mienshao
pokedex: Using the long fur on its arms like whips it launches into combo attacks that once started no one can stop.

name: Druddigon
pokedex: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls it can no longer move.

name: Golett
pokedex: Ancient science fashioned this Pokemon from clay. Its been active for thousands of years.

name: Golurk
pokedex: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

name: Pawniard
pokedex: Ignoring their injuries groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.

name: Bisharp
pokedex: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.

name: Bouffalant
pokedex: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

name: Rufflet
pokedex: With its sharp claws this Pokemon pierces its prey and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries its a carnivore at heart.

name: Braviary
pokedex: Its thought that people disturbed their habitats in the past so Braviary banded together to fight back.

name: Vullaby
pokedex: It cant fly yet and must wait until its wings have developed more. Since its still at a playful age it hops around friskily.

name: Mandibuzz
pokedex: It circles in the sky keeping a keen eye out for Pokemon in a weakened state. Its choicest food is Cubone.

name: Heatmor
pokedex: It draws in air through its tail transforms it into fire and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

name: Durant
pokedex: They attack in groups covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

name: Deino
pokedex: Lacking sight its unaware of its surroundings so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.

name: Zweilous
pokedex: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

name: Hydreigon
pokedex: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary three-headed Pokemon devours everything in its path!

name: Larvesta
pokedex: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

name: Volcarona
pokedex: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere it is said that Volcaronas fire provided a replacement for the sun.

name: Cobalion
pokedex: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokemon.

name: Terrakion
pokedex: Spoken of in legend this Pokemon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokemon.

name: Virizion
pokedex: Legends say this Pokemon confounded opponents with its swift movements.

name: Tornadus
pokedex: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.

name: Thundurus
pokedex: As it flies around it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.

name: Reshiram
pokedex: When Reshirams tail flares the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the worlds weather.

name: Zekrom
pokedex: Concealing itself in lightning clouds it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

name: Landorus
pokedex: From the forces of lightning and wind it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

name: Kyurem
pokedex: It generates a powerful freezing energy inside itself but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

name: Keldeo
pokedex: When it is resolute its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.

name: Meloetta
pokedex: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

name: Genesect
pokedex: This Pokemon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: Chespin
pokedex: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldnt faze it.

name: Quilladin
pokedex: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and wont start fights.

name: Chesnaught
pokedex: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face it could withstand a bomb blast.

name: Fennekin
pokedex: As it walks it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.

name: Braixen
pokedex: When the twig is plucked from its tail friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.

name: Delphox
pokedex: Using psychic power it generates a fiery vortex of 5400 degrees Fahrenheit incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

name: Froakie
pokedex: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

name: Frogadier
pokedex: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2000 feet in a minutes time.

name: Greninja
pokedex: It appears and vanishes with a ninjas grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

name: Bunnelby
pokedex: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.

name: Diggersby
pokedex: As powerful as an excavator its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When its finished digging it lounges lazily.

name: Fletchling
pokedex: When its excited its temperature can double spiking hormone production in its body.

name: Fletchinder
pokedex: It will not tolerate other Fletchinder entering its territory which has a radius of several miles.

name: Talonflame
pokedex: It zooms directly at its prey at flight speeds of close to 310 mph while fiery embers scatter from gaps in its feathers.

name: Scatterbug
pokedex: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature so it can live in any region or climate.

name: Spewpa
pokedex: The beaks of bird Pokemon cant begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself it spews powder.

name: Vivillon
pokedex: The patterns on this Pokemons wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

name: Litleo
pokedex: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokemon are quick to fight.

name: Pyroar
pokedex: With fiery breath of more than 10000 degrees Fahrenheit they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the prides cubs.

name: Flabebe
pokedex: When it finds a flower it likes it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the winds embrace with an untroubled heart.

name: Floette
pokedex: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.

name: Florges
pokedex: In times long past governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.

name: Skiddo
pokedex: If it has sunshine and water it doesnt need to eat because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.

name: Gogoat
pokedex: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.

name: Pancham
pokedex: Theres no point to the leaf in its mouth aside from an effort to look cool. Its mischievous so its not well suited to inexperienced Trainers.

name: Pangoro
pokedex: From the slight twitches of its bamboo leaf it deduces its opponents movements. Its eager to tussle but kindhearted toward its companions.

name: Furfrou
pokedex: Historically in the Kalos region these Pokemon were the designated guardians of the king.

name: Espurr
pokedex: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself but it has no control over its power.

name: Meowstic
pokedex: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

name: Honedge
pokedex: If anyone dares to grab its hilt it wraps a blue cloth around that persons arm and drains that persons life energy completely.

name: Doublade
pokedex: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.

name: Aegislash
pokedex: Apparently it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.

name: Spritzee
pokedex: In the past rather than using perfume royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.

name: Aromatisse
pokedex: Its scent is so overpowering that unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.

name: Swirlix
pokedex: Because it eats nothing but sweets its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.

name: Slurpuff
pokedex: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a humans so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. Its like it can see with its nose!

name: Inkay
pokedex: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body which drains its opponents will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.

name: Malamar
pokedex: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

name: Binacle
pokedex: They stretch and then contract yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

name: Barbaracle
pokedex: Barbaracles legs and hands have minds of their own and they will move independently. But they usually follow the heads orders.

name: Skrelp
pokedex: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.

name: Dragalge
pokedex: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live never to return.

name: Clauncher
pokedex: Through controlled explosions of internal gas it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances it can shatter rock.

name: Clawitzer
pokedex: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw it can move at a speed of 60 knots.

name: Helioptile
pokedex: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

name: Heliolisk
pokedex: It stimulates its muscles with electricity boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.

name: Tyrunt
pokedex: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.

name: Tyrantrum
pokedex: Nothing could stop this Pokemon 100 million years ago so it behaved like a king.

name: Amaura
pokedex: This calm Pokemon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.

name: Aurorus
pokedex: Using its diamond-shaped crystals it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponents attack.

name: Sylveon
pokedex: When this Pokemon sights its prey it swirls its ribbonlike feelers as a distraction. A moment later it pounces.

name: Hawlucha
pokedex: With its wings it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.

name: Dedenne
pokedex: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.

name: Carbink
pokedex: Although this Pokemon is not especially rare its glittering jewel-draped body draws attention from people.

name: Goomy
pokedex: Its source of protection is its slimy germ-laden mucous membrane. Anyone who touches it needs some thorough hand-washing.

name: Sliggoo
pokedex: This Pokemons mucous can dissolve anything. Toothless it sprays mucous on its prey. Once theyre nicely dissolved it slurps them up.

name: Goodra
pokedex: It gets picked on because its meek. But then whoever teased it gets to feel the full force of its horns and a good swatting from its thick tail.

name: Klefki
pokedex: It inserts its horn into chinks in metal absorbing metal ions. For some reason it collects keys.

name: Phantump
pokedex: According to legend medicine to cure any illness can be made by plucking the green leaves on its head brewing them and boiling down the liquid.

name: Trevenant
pokedex: Through its roots it exerts control over other trees. A deadly curse falls upon anyone cutting down trees in forests where Trevenant dwell.

name: Pumpkaboo
pokedex: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.

name: Gourgeist
pokedex: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.

name: Bergmite
pokedex: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.

name: Avalugg
pokedex: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.

name: Noibat
pokedex: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200000-hertz ultrasonic waves.

name: Noivern
pokedex: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.

name: Xerneas
pokedex: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

name: Yveltal
pokedex: When its life comes to an end it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.

name: Zygarde
pokedex: Its thought to be monitoring the ecosystem. There are rumors that even greater power lies hidden within it.

name: Diancie
pokedex: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.

name: Hoopa
pokedex: It is said to be able to seize anything it desires with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power sealed it is transformed into a much smaller form.

name: Volcanion
pokedex: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.

name: Rowlet
pokedex: Silently it glides drawing near its targets. Before they even notice it it begins to pelt them with vicious kicks.

name: Dartrix
pokedex: It throws sharp feathers called blade quills at enemies or prey. It seldom misses.

name: Decidueye
pokedex: Although basically cool and cautious when its caught by surprise its seized by panic.

name: Litten
pokedex: It doesnt allow its emotions to be easily seen. Earning its trust takes time. It prefers solitude.

name: Torracat
pokedex: It boasts powerful front legs. With a single punch it can bend an iron bar right over.

name: Incineroar
pokedex: After hurling ferocious punches and flinging furious kicks it finishes opponents off by spewing fire from around its navel.

name: Popplio
pokedex: This Pokemon can control water bubbles. It practices diligently so it can learn to make big bubbles.

name: Brionne
pokedex: It cares deeply for its companions. When its Trainer is feeling down it performs a cheery dance to try and help.

name: Primarina
pokedex: Its singing voice is its chief weapon in battle. This Pokemons Trainer must prioritize the daily maintenance of its throat at all costs.

name: Pikipek
pokedex: This Pokemon feeds on berries whose leftover seeds become the ammunition for the attacks it fires off from its mouth.

name: Trumbeak
pokedex: By bending its beak it can produce a variety of calls and brand itself a noisy nuisance for its neighbors.

name: Toucannon
pokedex: Within its beak its internal gas ignites explosively launching seeds with enough power to pulverize boulders.

name: Yungoos
pokedex: It wanders around in a never-ending search for food. At dusk it collapses from exhaustion and falls asleep on the spot.

name: Gumshoos
pokedex: It adores having Rattata and Raticate for dinner but as its diurnal it never encounters them. This Pokemon boasts incredible patience.

name: Grubbin
pokedex: They often gather near places frequented by electric Pokemon in order to avoid being attacked by bird Pokemon.

name: Charjabug
pokedex: From the food it digests it generates electricity and it stores this energy in its electric sac.

name: Vikavolt
pokedex: It produces electricity via an electrical organ in its abdomen. It overwhelms bird Pokemon with shocking beams of electrical energy.

name: Crabrawler
pokedex: It punches so much its pincers often come off from overuse but they grow back quickly. What little meat they contain is rich and delicious.

name: Crabominable
pokedex: It just throws punches indiscriminately. In times of desperation it can lop off its own pincers and fire them like rockets.

name: Oricorio
pokedex: This Oricorio has sipped red nectar. Its passionate dance moves cause its enemies to combust in both body and mind.

name: Cutiefly
pokedex: Myriads of Cutiefly flutter above the heads of people who have auras resembling those of flowers.

name: Ribombee
pokedex: Some of Ribombees pollen puffs are highly nutritious. They are sometimes sold as supplements.

name: Rockruff
pokedex: This Pokemon has lived with people since times long ago. It can sense when its Trainer is in the dumps and will stick close by its Trainers side.

name: Lycanroc
pokedex: When properly raised from a young age it will become a trustworthy partner that will absolutely never betray its Trainer.

name: Wishiwashi
pokedex: Its awfully weak and notably tasty so everyone is always out to get it. As it happens anyone trying to bully it receives a painful lesson.

name: Mareanie
pokedex: Its found crawling on beaches and seafloors. The coral that grows on Corsolas head is as good as a five-star banquet to this Pokemon.

name: Toxapex
pokedex: Those attacked by Toxapexs poison will suffer intense pain for three days and three nights. Post-recovery there will be some aftereffects.

name: Mudbray
pokedex: It has a stubborn individualistic disposition. Eating dirt making mud and playing in the mire all form part of its daily routine.

name: Mudsdale
pokedex: Its heavy mud-covered kicks are its best means of attack and it can reduce large trucks to scrap without breaking a sweat.

name: Dewpider
pokedex: When it comes across enemies or potential prey this Pokemon smashes its water-bubble-covered head into them.

name: Araquanid
pokedex: Despite what its appearance suggests it cares for others. If it finds vulnerable weak Pokemon it protectively brings them into its water bubble.

name: Fomantis
pokedex: They give off a sweet and refreshing scent. Cutiefly often gather near the tall grass where Fomantis are hiding.

name: Lurantis
pokedex: It fires beams from its sickle-shaped petals. These beams are powerful enough to cleave through thick metal plates.

name: Morelull
pokedex: As it drowses the day away it nourishes itself by sucking from tree roots. It wakens at the fall of night wandering off in search of a new tree.

name: Shiinotic
pokedex: It emits flickering spores that cause drowsiness. When its prey succumb to sleep this Pokemon feeds on them by sucking in their energy.

name: Salandit
pokedex: Volcanoes or dry craggy places are its home. It emanates a sweet-smelling poisonous gas that attracts bug Pokemon then attacks them.

name: Salazzle
pokedex: Filled with pheromones its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.

name: Stufful
pokedex: A touch from anyone except a known friend sends it into a surging frenzy. Its an incredibly dangerous Pokemon.

name: Bewear
pokedex: This Pokemon has the habit of hugging its companions. Many Trainers have left this world after their spines were squashed by its hug.

name: Bounsweet
pokedex: Although its too sugary for human consumption Bounsweets sweat can be watered down into a juice with just the right amount of sweetness.

name: Steenee
pokedex: This Pokemon is always bouncing around energetically. Other Pokemon are attracted by its lively appearance and pleasant aroma.

name: Tsareena
pokedex: A Pokemon known for the beauty of its well-shaped legs it sometimes appears as a mascot in advertisements for beauty salons.

name: Comfey
pokedex: Baths prepared with the flowers from its vine have a relaxing effect so this Pokemon is a hit with many people.

name: Oranguru
pokedex: Deep in the jungle high in the lofty canopy this Pokemon abides. On rare occasions it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.

name: Passimian
pokedex: They battle with hard berries for weapons. Their techniques are passed from the boss to the group generation upon generation.

name: Wimpod
pokedex: Its habitat varies from beaches to seabeds. A natural scavenger it will gleefully chow down on anything edible no matter how rotten.

name: Golisopod
pokedex: It battles skillfully with its six arms but spends most of its time peacefully meditating in caves deep beneath the sea.

name: Sandygast
pokedex: It takes control of anyone who puts a hand in its mouth. And so it adds to the accumulation of its sand-mound body.

name: Palossand
pokedex: Buried beneath the castle are masses of dried-up bones from those whose vitality it has drained.

name: Pyukumuku
pokedex: These Pokemon line the beaches. The sticky mucous that covers their bodies can be used to soothe sunburned skin. How convenient!

name: Type: Null
pokedex: Due to the danger that this synthetic Pokemon may go on a rampage it wears a control mask to restrain its power.

name: Silvally
pokedex: Although its name was Type: Null at first the boy who evolved it into this form gave it the name by which it is now known.

name: Minior
pokedex: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokemon was born from mutated nanoparticles.

name: Komala
pokedex: The log it holds was given to it by its parents at birth. It has also been known to cling to the arm of a friendly Trainer.

name: Turtonator
pokedex: It gushes fire and poisonous gases from its nostrils. Its dung is an explosive substance and can be put to various uses.

name: Togedemaru
pokedex: The long hairs on its back act as lightning rods. The bolts of lightning it attracts are stored as energy in its electric sac.

name: Mimikyu
pokedex: A lonely Pokemon it conceals its terrifying appearance beneath an old rag so it can get closer to people and other Pokemon.

name: Bruxish
pokedex: It stuns its prey with psychokinesis and then grinds them to mush with its strong teeth. Even Shellders shell is no match for it.

name: Drampa
pokedex: This Pokemon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.

name: Dhelmise
pokedex: The soul of seaweed adrift in the waves became reborn as this Pokemon. It maintains itself with new infusions of seabed detritus and seaweed.

name: Jangmo-o
pokedex: They live in mountains where no trace of humans can be detected. Jangmo-o grow little by little as they battle one another.

name: Hakamo-o
pokedex: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time theyre regrown.

name: Kommo-o
pokedex: Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other commodities.

name: Tapu Koko
pokedex: It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later.

name: Tapu Lele
pokedex: As it flutters about it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.

name: Tapu Bulu
pokedex: The guardian deity of Ulaula is a lazy Pokemon. It commands plants to immobilize its foes and then deals them a savage blow with its horns.

name: Tapu Fini
pokedex: The guardian deity of Poni it can control water. People say it can create pure water that will wash away any uncleanness.

name: Cosmog
pokedex: In ages past it was called the child of the stars. Its said to be a Pokemon from another world but no specific details are known.

name: Cosmoem
pokedex: Theres something accumulating around the black core within its hard shell. People think this Pokemon may come from another world.

name: Solgaleo
pokedex: This Pokemon is said to be a male evolution of Cosmog. At the activation of its third eye it departs for another world.

name: Lunala
pokedex: Said to live in another world this Pokemon devours light drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.

name: Nihilego
pokedex: One of the Ultra Beasts. Its unclear whether or not this Pokemon is sentient but sometimes it can be observed behaving like a young girl.

name: Buzzwole
pokedex: A mysterious life-form called an Ultra Beast. Witnesses saw it pulverize a dump truck with a single punch.

name: Pheromosa
pokedex: One of the Ultra Beasts. It refuses to touch anything perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world.

name: Xurkitree
pokedex: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. It raided a power plant so people think it energizes itself with electricity.

name: Celesteela
pokedex: One kind of Ultra Beast. Witnesses have seen it burn down a forest by expelling gas from its two arms.

name: Kartana
pokedex: One of the Ultra Beast life-forms it was observed cutting down a gigantic steel tower with one stroke of its blade.

name: Guzzlord
pokedex: A dangerous Ultra Beast it appears to be eating constantly but for some reason its droppings have never been found.

name: Necrozma
pokedex: Light is apparently the source of its energy. It has an extraordinarily vicious disposition and is constantly firing off laser beams.

name: Magearna
pokedex: Its mechanized body is merely a vessel. Its true self is its Soul-Heart an artificial soul.
